title: Development of plots with area 4,000 sq
clause_text: Development of plots with area 4,000 sq. m and more and up to 10,000 sq. m shall require handing over 5% of plot area to MCGM as POS.
section: In Plots/lay-outs of the land admeasuring 4000 sq. m or more:

source_pdf.text_snippet: Development of plots with area 4,000 sq. m and more and up to 10,000 sq. m shall require handing over 5% of plot area to MCGM as POS.
